overview:
Kate Dixon joined SET Consulting in June of 2006. Kate works in the editing and communication departments within SET Consultingâ€™s numerous document production and automation projects. She has worked in development and communications for not-for-profit organizations in the Boston, Chicago, and Washington, DC areas. She now divides her time between SET Consulting and the National Womenâ€™s Law Center, where she works as a grant writer and editor. Kate received her Bachelor of Arts in English from the University of Massachusetts, Amherst and a Master of Arts in English from Boston College.

Source: SET Consulting
